mapper.select: select count(*) from (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TIMESTAMP, from_unixtime(floor(TIMESTAMP/1000)) AS RESULT_TIME, S_VAL, H_VAL, L_VAL, E_VAL FROM fx_result_sec WHERE TIMESTAMP < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{resultDate}, ':00')) * 1000 AND (SELECT COUNT(RT) FROM fx_result WHERE RT = CONCAT(#{resultDate}, ':00') AND RIGHT(S_TIME, 2) != '00') > 0 ORDER BY TIMESTAMP DESC LIMIT 1 ) TEMP UNION SELECT TIMESTAMP, from_unixtime(floor(TIMESTAMP/1000)) AS RESULT_TIME, S_VAL, H_VAL, L_VAL, E_VAL FROM fx_result_sec WHERE TIMESTAMP >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{resultDate}, ':00')) * 1000 AND TIMESTAMP < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{resultDate}, ':00'), INTERVAL #{runTime} MINUTE)) * 1000 ORDER BY TIMESTAMP) as CNTR

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS row_number,TIMESTAMP,SSS,RESULT_TIME, S_VAL, H_VAL, L_VAL, E_VAL from ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TIMESTAMP, from_unixtime(floor(TIMESTAMP/1000), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS RESULT_TIME,SUBSTR(TIMESTAMP,LENGTH(TIMESTAMP) - 2,4) as SSS, S_VAL, H_VAL, L_VAL, E_VAL FROM fx_result_sec WHERE TIMESTAMP < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{resultDate}, ':00')) * 1000 AND (SELECT COUNT(RT) FROM fx_result WHERE RT = CONCAT(#{resultDate}, ':00') AND RIGHT(S_TIME, 2) != '00') > 0 ORDER BY TIMESTAMP DESC LIMIT 1 ) TEMP UNION SELECT TIMESTAMP, from_unixtime(floor(TIMESTAMP/1000), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS RESULT_TIME,SUBSTR(TIMESTAMP,LENGTH(TIMESTAMP) - 2,4) as SSS, S_VAL, H_VAL, L_VAL, E_VAL FROM fx_result_sec WHERE TIMESTAMP >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{resultDate}, ':00')) * 1000 AND TIMESTAMP < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{resultDate}, ':00'), INTERVAL #{runTime} MINUTE)) * 1000 ORDER BY TIMESTAMP) as AAA cross join (select @rownum := 0) r ) TEMP
